attributes.action: Allow people taking the maths gcse to be able to have all formulas in the exam.
attributes.additional_details: Allow formulas to be allowed in all further maths gcses exams.
attributes.background: By giving the formulas in the maths exam it would allow students to be able to get a higher grade and be able to persue careers they wish without having to retake the exam instead of doing something that they would otherwise not be able to do.
